mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PLAYER ( USER_NO, GRADE, PLAYER_POSITION, PLAYER_DATE, PLAYER_INTRO, PLAYER_SALARY, PLAYER_NO, PLAYER_STATUS, PLAYER_TEAM ) VALUES ( 2, #{grade}, #{playerPosition}, SYSDATE, #{playerIntro}, #{playerSalary}, 27, 'N', 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT USER_NO userNo, GRADE grade, PLAYER_POSITION playerPosition, PLAYER_NO playerNo, PLAYER_STATUS playerStatus, PLAYER_TEAM playerTeam, FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_TEAM = #{playerTeam} AND PLAYER_STATUS = 'Y' JOIN
ORDER BY USER_NAME ASC

SELECT USER_NO userNo, GRADE grade, PLAYER_POSITION playerPosition, PLAYER_NO playerNo, PLAYER_STATUS playerStatus, PLAYER_TEAM playerTeam, TEAM_NAME teamName FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_TEAM = #{playerTeam} AND PLAYER_STATUS = 'Y' JOIN
ORDER BY COUNT ASC
